data.title: Games like Blade of Darkness Demo • Games similar to Blade of Darkness Demo • RAWG
data.meta_description: Games similar to Blade of Darkness Demo on RAWG ✔ Video game discovery site ✔ The most comprehensive database that is powered by personal player experiences
data.text:
Blade of Darkness is an indie, action, adventure and RPG game developed by General Arcade, Rebel Act Studios and Fire Falcom. It came out on 06-10-2021. Nav Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. You can play Blade of Darkness on PC. You can purchase the game on GOG and Steam. Xavier Carrillo Costa directed the game. Óscar Araujo scored the game.

Quake (2021) is an action-shooter game developed by id Software, Bethesda Game Studios and Night Dive Studios. It was originally released in 2021. It was published by Bethesda. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended". You can play Quake (2021) on PC, macOS, Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on Xbox Store. American McGee, Dan Tudge, Harry A. Miller IV and Jerk Gustafsson produced the game. It was directed by American McGee, Dan Tudge, Jens Matthies and John Carmack. It was scored by American McGee and Trent Reznor.

Sir Whoopass: Immortal Death is a game developed by Atomic Elbow. It came out on 17-08-2022. Atomic Elbow published the game. You can play Sir Whoopass: Immortal Death on PC. The game is sold via GOG.

Chasm: The Rift is an action-shooter game developed by General Arcade, Action Forms and WizardWorks. It came out on 30-09-1997. SNEG published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG. Chasm: The Rift is available on PC. You can purchase the game on Steam and GOG.

ArcaniA is an action-RPG game developed by THQ Nordic and Spellbound Entertainment. It came out on 11-10-2010. Nordic Games Publishing published the game. ArcaniA has a Metascore of 63, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG. ArcaniA is available on Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PC. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store, Steam, GOG and Xbox 360 Store. BVT produced the game. Daniel Miller directed the game. It was scored by Dynamedion.

One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party is a casual adventure game developed by DarkChibiShadow. It came out on 02-12-2019. It was published by DarkChibiShadow. One-Eyed Lee and the Dinner Party is available on Linux, PC, macOS and Xbox One. The game is sold via Steam, Xbox Store and itch.io.

Table of Tales: The Crooked Crown is an adventure, RPG and strategy game developed by Tin Man Games, Tin Man Games Pty and Zero One Studio. It came out on 16-04-2019. Tin Man Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG. You can play Table of Tales: The Crooked Crown on PlayStation 4 and PC. You can purchase the game on PlayStation Store and Steam.

Severance: Blade of Darkness is an action game developed by Rebel Act Studios. It came out on 22-02-2001. Codemasters published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG. You can play Severance: Blade of Darkness on PC. The game is sold via Steam.

God of War (2018) is an action game developed by Santa Monica Studio. It was originally released in 2018. It was published by PlayStation PC. God of War (2018) has a Metascore of 94, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional". You can play God of War (2018) on PC and PlayStation 4. You can purchase the game on GOG, PlayStation Store, Steam and Epic Games Store. Chad Cox, Elizabeth Dahm Wang, Eric Fong and Sean Llewellyn produced the game. It was directed by Cory Barlog and Matt Sophos. It was scored by Bear McCreary.

Dark Fracture is an indie, action, adventure and simulation game developed by Twisted II Studio. Dark Fracture is available on PC. You can purchase the game on GOG and Steam.
